sentence.Network_en: Draff is good enough for swine.
sentence.Network_cn: 喂猪只需要用猪食(意为不作不必要的浪费).

sentence.Network_en: The still sow eats up all the draff.
sentence.Network_cn: 不声不响的猪吃光全部的饲料.

sentence.Network_en: Draff is your errand , but drink ye would.
sentence.Network_cn: 口称有事相扰, 实为借口吃喝.
